description: Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the code block cited in the reference section below
name: Invoke-Obfuscation Obfuscated IEX Invocation - PowerShell Module
query: Payload:/\$PSHome\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$PSHome\[/ OR Payload:/\$ShellId\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$ShellId\[/ OR Payload:/\$env:Public\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$env:Public\[/ OR Payload:/\$env:ComSpec\[(\s*\d{1,3}\s*,){2}/ OR Payload:/\*mdr\*\W\s*\)\.Name/ OR Payload:/\$VerbosePreference\.ToString\(/ OR Payload:/\[String\]\s*\$VerbosePreference/
author: Daniel Bohannon (@Mandiant/@FireEye), oscd.community
